findings.title: Incorrect Liquidity Mining in DackieV3LmPool
findings.description: The `getRewardGrowthInside()` function does not consider a possible underflow situation that may make the associated `MasterChef V3` smart contract unable to calculate reward for the positions whose initial `rewardGrowthInsideX128` values were negative underflow.

findings.title: Lack of Timelocked finalWithdraw() in DackiePadInitializableV5/V6
findings.description: The admin function finalWithdraw() lacks a timelock, allowing it to withdraw all funds from IDO contracts without restriction.

findings.title: Incorrect NFT Removal Logic in SmartChefNFT
findings.description: The removeTokenId() function in SmartChefNFT contract has a potential issue where it can be abused to withdraw a tokenId that does not belong to the withdrawing user.

findings.title: Improved Ether Transfer With Necessary Reentrancy Guard
findings.description: The `withdraw()` routine directly calls the native `transfer()` routine to transfer ETH, which may fail due to Out-of-Gas issue and cause ETH to be locked in the contract.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the DackieSwap protocol, there is a privileged `owner` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.
